Package chess

Class piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.piece
  • public class piece
extends java.lang.Object
    Piece object that represents a chess piece. A piece object has qualities of a chess piece, which includes its color, its piece type, and its location on the chess board.
    Version:
    1.2 Mar 2021
    Author:
    Charles Li, Max Sun

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      piece​(char color, char name, int n, int l)
      Default piece constructor, Only Kings and Rooks assume castle capability.

    • Constructor Detail

      • piece

        public piece​(char color,
             char name,
             int n,
             int l)
        Default piece constructor, Only Kings and Rooks assume castle capability.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the chess piece
        name - the type of chess piece, abbreviated as a single character
        n - the vertical coordinate of the piece on the board
        l - the horizontal coordinate of the piece on the board

        public void setN​(int n)
        Sets the vertical coordinate of the chess piece.
        Parameters:

      • setL

        public void setL​(int l)
        Sets the horizontal coordinate of the chess piece.
        Parameters:

      • canCastle

        public boolean canCastle()
        Gets the castle capability of the chess piece. This is to be used with Kings and Rooks.
        Returns:
        the castle capability of the chess piece

      • setCastle

        public void setCastle​(boolean castle)
        Sets the castle capability of the chess piece. This is to be used with Kings and Rooks.
        Parameters:
        castle - the desired castle capability of the chess piece
